meanings.definition: limitless or endless in space, extent, or size
meanings.sent1: The universe is filled with infinite stars.
meanings.sent2: The desert seemed to stretch on infinitely.
meanings.sent3: I have an infinite amount of socks, but they all seem to disappear in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as infinite as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The possibilities of the future are truly infinite.

meanings.definition: extending indefinitely; having no end or limit
meanings.sent1: The road ahead appeared infinite in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed infinitely towards the horizon.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle Christmas lights can feel like an infinite task.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as infinite as the sky above.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range seemed to have an infinite number of peaks.

meanings.sent1: The elephant's size was truly infinite compared to the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The library contained an infinite amount of books.
meanings.sent3: Her appetite for ice cream was seemingly infinite.
meanings.sent4: The artist's talent was as infinite as the colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The universe's mysteries are truly infinite.
